00027 #ifndef CELL_CACHE_POOL_H
00028 #define CELL_CACHE_POOL_H
00029 
00030 #include <boost/thread/condition.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>
00032 
00033 #include <cstdlib>                              /* malloc, free */
00034 
00035 #include "Common/Mutex.h"
00036 
00037 /* By default, we malloc 512KB for each buffer. 512KB is an experience value */
00038 #define CCP_BUF_SIZE        (512*1024)
00039 #define CCP_WORD_SIZE       (sizeof(void*))
00040 
00041 namespace Hypertable {
00042 
00043   class CellCachePool {
00044     /* list node, we use a reverse list here */
00045     struct BufNode {
00046       uint8_t *m_buf;
00047       BufNode *m_prev;
00048 
00049       BufNode(size_t sz, BufNode *m_prev_node = NULL) {
00050         this->m_prev = m_prev_node;
00051 
00052         /* alloc memory */
00053         m_buf = (uint8_t*)malloc(sz);
00054         if (!m_buf) {
00055           /* TODO: wait and try for several times */
00056           std::cerr << "Out of memory!\n";
00057         }
00058       }
00059 
00060       ~BufNode() {
00061         if (m_buf) {
00062           free(m_buf);
00063           m_buf = NULL;
00064         }
00065       }
00066     };
00067 
00068   public:
00069     CellCachePool(size_t sz = CCP_BUF_SIZE)
00070       : m_buf_size(sz), m_total_allocated(0), m_pre_buf(NULL), m_cur_buf(NULL),
00071         m_head_ptr(NULL), m_tail_ptr(NULL) {}
00072 
00073       ~CellCachePool();
00074 
00075       void pool_free() {
00076         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00077 
00078         /* free all the memory in the pool */
00079         while (m_cur_buf) {
00080           BufNode *tmp = m_cur_buf->m_prev;
00081           delete m_cur_buf;
00082           m_cur_buf = tmp;
00083         }
00084 
00085         /* reset pointers */
00086         m_pre_buf = NULL;
00087         m_head_ptr = NULL;
00088         m_tail_ptr = NULL;
00089       }
00090 
00091       /* We put data of the the same type together, "is_map" is used for
00092        * CellMap
00093        */
00094       void *allocate(size_t size, bool is_map = false) {
00095         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00096 
00097         /*
00098          * If current buffer is full, we create a new buffer automatically
00099          * and if the request size is larger than the "m_buf_size",
00100          * we used the larger one. < REGRESSION >
00101          */
00102         if (m_head_ptr + size > m_tail_ptr) {
00103           int sz = size > m_buf_size? size:m_buf_size;
00104           if (!get_buf(sz)) return NULL;
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (is_map) {
00108           m_tail_ptr -= size;
00109           return m_tail_ptr;
00110         } else {
00111           uint8_t *ptr = m_head_ptr;
00112           m_head_ptr += size;
00113           return ptr;
00114         }
00115       }
00116 
00117       void deallocate(void *ptr, size_t sz= 0) {
00118         /* Unimplemented. No need here. We free all the memory when the
00119          * CellCache is destructing. */
00120       }
00121 
00122       /* For debug, not very accurate, but enough */
00123       void dump_stat() {
00124         int i = 1;
00125         BufNode *p = m_cur_buf;
00126         while (p) {
00127           p = p->m_prev;
00128           i++;
00129         }
00130 
00131         std::cout << "Current Pool Size : "
00132                   << i * m_buf_size + m_head_ptr - m_tail_ptr
00133                   <<"; Free size : " << m_tail_ptr - m_head_ptr << std::endl;
00134       }
00135 
00136   private:
00137       uint8_t *get_buf(size_t sz);
00138 
00139       Mutex    m_mutex;
00140       size_t   m_buf_size;              /* buffer's size */
00141       uint64_t m_total_allocated;
00142       BufNode *m_pre_buf;
00143       BufNode *m_cur_buf;
00144 
00145       /* pointers used to manage the current buffer */
00146       uint8_t   *m_head_ptr;
00147       uint8_t   *m_tail_ptr;
00148   };
00149 
00150 }
00151 
00152 #endif
